menu_items.description: Juicy beef patty with melted cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomato, and special sauce on a toasted bun.
Classic Neapolitan-style pizza with fresh mozzarella cheese, San Marzano tomato sauce, and basil leaves.
Crisp romaine lettuce, garlic croutons, shaved parmesan cheese, and tangy Caesar dressing.
Beer-battered cod fillet with crispy fries, tartar sauce, and lemon wedges.
Classic Italian dessert made with ladyfingers, mascarpone cheese, espresso, and cocoa powder.
